home.getTracker: Get the AR tracking marker image. Follow the instructions in order to set up the visualization of 3D models in AR.
home.tryVisualizer: Try out the 3D model visualizer. Adjust its properties and then place the default 3D part in AR space using your phone's camera passthrough.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.effectiveDate: Effective date: {date}. This Privacy Policy describes how {author} ("we", "us") collects, uses and discloses personal data when you use the AR/CAD Viewer web application (the "Service"). Replace placeholders and review with counsel.

dataWeCollect.account: Account information (email, name) if you register.
dataWeCollect.uploadedFiles: Uploaded files and models (CAD/3D assets) that you provide to use the Service.
dataWeCollect.usage: Usage and telemetry (pages visited, features used) for diagnostics and improvement.
dataWeCollect.device: Device and connection data (browser, IP address, OS) for security and operation.
dataWeCollect.cookies: Cookies and similar technologies — only as required and with consent for analytics.

privacyPolicy.purposeText: We process personal data to provide the Service (performance of a contract), to operate, secure and improve the Service (legitimate interests), and with your consent for optional analytics or marketing. Where required by law, we will ask for consent before processing.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartiesText: We use third-party processors (e.g., hosting, analytics). Data is hosted on servers of Vercel(AWS) and Neon Tech(AWS Europe Central 1 Frankfurt). If transfers outside the EU occur we use appropriate safeguards (e.g., SCCs) or ensure the provider offers adequate protection.
privacyPolicy.retentionText: We retain personal data as long as necessary to provide the Service, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes and enforce agreements. Retention periods vary by data type.

rights.access: Access the personal data we hold about you.
rights.erasure: Erasure ("right to be forgotten") subject to legal exceptions.
rights.restriction: Restriction or objection to processing and data portability.
rights.withdrawConsent: Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent.
rights.complaint: Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority in your EU Member State.

privacyPolicy.cookiesText: Non-essential cookies (analytics, optional features) are used only with your consent. Essential cookies for security and basic operation are used as necessary.
privacyPolicy.securityText: We implement reasonable administrative, technical and physical safeguards to protect personal data. No system is completely secure; notify us at cezar.luca96@gmail.com about concerns.
privacyPolicy.childrenText: The Service is not directed to children under 13 (or the applicable local age). We do not knowingly collect personal data from children.
privacyPolicy.changesText: We may update this policy; we will post the effective date. Significant changes will be communicated where required.

qrCodeModal.scanCode: Scan this code to view in AR/3D.

screenshotOverlay.couldNotFindModel: Could not find model ID. Make sure this is one of your uploaded models.
screenshotOverlay.uploadFailed: Failed to upload screenshot. Please try again.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.effectiveDate: Effective date: {date}. These Terms govern your use of the AR/CAD Viewer web application provided by {author}. By using the Service you agree to these Terms.
termsOfService.useOfService: You may use the Service in compliance with these Terms and applicable law. You are responsible for your account, credentials, and for all activities under your account.
termsOfService.userContent: You retain ownership of files and models you upload. By uploading you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to store, display and process your content as necessary to provide the Service.
termsOfService.prohibited: Do not upload illegal, infringing, harmful or offensive material. We may remove or disable access to content that violates these Terms.
termsOfService.termination: We may suspend or terminate access for violations of these Terms or for legal reasons. Users may delete their accounts and data as provided by the Service.
termsOfService.disclaimer: The Service is provided "as is". To the fullest extent permitted by law, we disclaim warranties and limit liability for damages arising from use of the Service.
termsOfService.indemnification: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless {author} from claims arising from your breach of these Terms or your content.
termsOfService.governingLaw: These Terms are governed by the laws of the EU. Disputes should first be attempted to be resolved through negotiation; you may also lodge complaints with local consumer authorities as allowed by law.

tracker.description: This tracker image is used to place 3D models in augmented reality. Print or display it at a size of 50x50 millimeters (2x2 inches) for best results.

instructions.step3: Place the printed tracker on a flat surface with good lighting.
instructions.step5: Go to the link {link} and in the Search flags field, search for {flag} and enable it. (You may need to restart the browser.)
instructions.step6: In AR mode, point your device's camera at the tracker to place your 3D model in augmented reality.

tips.tip1: Ensure the entire tracker is visible in your camera view.
tips.tip2: Avoid shadows or glare on the printed tracker.
tips.tip3: For best results, print on non-glossy paper.
tips.tip4: If using on-screen, maintain the 50x50mm dimensions.
